Test Case Description: Log in with a phone number less than 10 digits
Test Steps:
1. Click login
2. Enter a phone number of less than 10 digits.
3. Submit Login
Expected Result: Error message: "Invalid number/email. Please try again."

Test Case Description: Log in with a phone number greater than 10 digits
Test Steps:
1. Click login
2. Enter a phone number with more than 10 digits.
3. Submit Login
Expected Result: Error message: "Invalid number/email. Please try again."
